title: In love folly is always sweet
desc: I seem to have loved you in numberless forms, numberless times, In life after life, in age after age forever.

title: that loves is always young
desc: My spell-bound heart has made and remade the necklace of songs. That you take as a gift, wear round your neck in your many forms. In life after life, in age after age forever.

title: Love is a fire which burns unseen
desc: Whenever I hear old chronicles of love, its age-old pain, Its ancient tale of being apart or together

title: Love is a light that never dims
desc: As I stare on and on into the past, in the end you emerge. Clad in the light of a pole-star piercing the darkness of time: You become an image of what is remembered forever.

title: The darkness is no darkness with you
desc: You and I have floated here on the stream that brings from the fount. At the heart of time love of one for another.

title: Brief is life, but love is long
desc: We have played alongside millions of lovers, shared in the same. Shy sweetness of meeting, the same distressful tears of farewell - Old love, but in shapes that renew and renew forever.

title: First impression of you is most lasting
desc: Today it is heaped at your feet, it has found its end in you, The love of all man's days both past and forever: Universal joy, universal sorrow, universal life,

title: there are aways love
desc: The memories of all loves merging with this one love of ours - And the songs of everypoet both past and forever.

title: Tell me you are mine
desc: Stray birds of summer come to my window to sing and fly away. And yellow leaves of autumn, which have no songs, flutter and fall there with a sign.

title: Love is like a butterfly
desc: The world puts off its mask of vastness to its lover. It becomes small as one song, as one kiss of the eternal

title: Love is something eternal
desc: Once we dreamt that we were strangers. We wake up to find that we were dear to each

title: Live with sunshine
desc: But if the while I think on thee, dear friend, all losses are restored, and-sorrows end.

title: Love never dies
desc: No matter the ending is perfect or not, you cannot disappear from my world.

title: Love is blind
desc: Tell me you are mine. I’ll be yours through all the years, till the end of-time.
